post:
Hi,

Looking to swap my 128MB RAM
512MB burst
4GB HDD
1TB Bandwidth
OpenVZ
West Coast USA 

for OpenVZ/Xen in UK/Europe/East Coast USA. Must have minimum 64MB RAM although 96 would be better, 2GB HDD, not bothered about bandwidth. Got this from VirtualVM. 

Or I'll sell it for $6 dollars (4 GBP). This would ideal for someone from the USA or Asia. I need a server in UK/Europe/East Coast USA to reduce ping times/latency.

If you're interested let me know.
